1415350.name: Star Shaman Soundtrack
1415350.description:
We know you've been fighting your way through multiple planets to restore the galaxy. We also know that in between those spells, you can't seem to get the intergalactic soundtrack out of your head.
Today we invite you to enjoy the Star Shaman soundtrack outside of the VR world. Whether you are at home, commuting, or preparing to battle your boss, you can now enjoy this funky soundtrack with a French-touch vibe anyplace.

All tracks 320 Kbps MP3 - mastering by Nick Burchall at Audio Animals.
